alert.note: Alert for Southwest San Juan Mountains; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 2:13PM MST until February 24 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM THURSDAY TO 5 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Uncompahgre Plateau and Dallas Divide and Southwest San Juan Mountains. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 5 AM MST Thursday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 5 AM Thursday to 5 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult at times. Snow and blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility, especially in open areas. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Southwest San Juan Mountains; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide
